chapters.title: Chapter 46: Working Leather
chapters.info: Nensen, p. 689—Man who has been exceedingly successful after Taim's “lessons.” His success has the other recruits eager for their own private lessons. He was barely powerful enough to be raised to the Dedicated a short time ago; now he is a full Asha'man. Androl worries he learns too quickly, perhaps impossibly so.
